text: PANNING OVER GIRLS’ STUFF abandoned on dead grass. GIRL’S VOICE #1 (0.S.) They left things in the clearing and walked into the trees. Holding hands...
We keep panning over the discarded items. A journal, a ph inexpensive jewelry, a bedazzled cellphone... But each item is either ripped or smashed.

POLICE search with dogs. ONE OF THE POLICEMEN holds up a TEDDY BEAR. Torn in half... BOY’S VOICE #1 (0.S.) All the girls were like totally normal. None of them was on drugs or anything. One of them was like a Girl Scout. Or Explorer Scout. Or something like that...

head_text.subj: A RAPID-FIRE SERIES OF CLASS PHOTOS

text: TEENAGED GIRLS' faces. Some freckled, most smiling. GIRL’S VOICE #2 (0.S.) Jennifer, Ellen, Allison, Carly, Rebekah, Margo, Kylie...
A CHEERLEADER talks directly into her Web Cam.
The school library burned down the same day. It was pretty freaky. Some pretty mysterious shit.  Blue Rev. (06/09/16) 2.
POLICE and FIREMEN mill about a smoldering structure. A s standing sign says: CUMBERLAND HIGH SCHOOL LIBRARY.
A BOY WITH GLASSES talks to his Web Cam.
I just can’t see a natural fire burning that hot. The walls were melted. I bet the only place anybody'd ever seen anything like that was in Hiroshima.
The same burned structure. WORKERS sift through the ashes A FIREMAN, standing amid the charred ruins of the library holds up an intact SURVEILLANCE CAMERA.
Black and white footage of the girls walking from the clearing into the woods. GIRL’S VOICE #3 (0.S.) People said they heard screams. Coming from the woods...
Follow a GIRL through waist-high sunflowers. GIRL’S VOICE #4 (0.S.) But Allison Riley wasn’t like the others. She came back... Allison staggers slightly.

The cop who found her said she was holding something. Turned out it was... Viewed from the front, Allison is holding something. She raises her eyes toward us. And opens her hands. As if offering what's in them. Some bloody mess of something...  10 11 12 13 14 15 Blue Rev. (06/09/16) 3.

head_text.subj: TYPED WORDS APPEAR ON A GLOWING SCREEN 10

text: One letter at a time: "Her own tongue.”

Filmed through safety glass inset in a door. The girl, Allison, has a haunted look on her face. GIRL’S VOICE #5 (0.S.) They gave her a piece of paper and asked her to write down what happened. But she only wrote one word...

head_text.subj: TYPED WORDS APPEAR ON A GLOWING SCREEN 12

text: One letter at a time: “Him.”

Of the girls walking into the woods. PUSH IN to the background on a dark aberration. Blurred and out of focus incomprehensible human shape. Hideously tall and thin. Featureless. Disproportionately arms extending downwards. A terrifying, faceless figure...

ON VIDEO: A cat dances while wearing shades and a bow-tie This is on a cell in the hand of HALLIE, 17, fit and athletic. Hair pulled back in a pony tail. A lively spark Hallie’s eyes quickly evolves into a brilliant smile. She leans over and replays the video for KATIE, 17, sitti next to her in the bleachers. Unlike Hallie, she doesn’t the part in a “Massachusetts Charter” P.E. uniform. Katie draws her hair back and stares at the screen. The d old eyeliner around her eyes was left on intentionally. A tiny act of defiance.  Blue Rev. (06/09/16) 4.
It'd be better if he didn't have the bow-tie. A quirky little grin flashes across Katie’s face.
It'd be better if he exploded at the end.
(calling from the field) Katie, you're up! Katie brazenly ignores him. Hallie gives her a look.
Whatever. He'll give up after a second. He doesn't really want me having a heart attack on his field. The P.E. Teacher indeed moves on. Hallie smiles.
I'm forwarding this to Wren...

WREN, 17, talks to her very PATIENT TEACHER having his sa lunch. Her carefully disheveled bob and retro-cool glasse lend her a unique and clever sense of style. High school posh with a Euro flair makes sure she sticks
I've been thinking about my short story collection. I'm thinking maybe it's a novel. Wren looks at her phone. Sees the video link from Hallie. Watches and texts back: Groovy.

Of course, when I'm published my mother will hire someone to kill me. There are things in there she doesn't know I know. Things her theater friends in Berlin told me. They were shocked and Berliners don't shock easily... Do you know the city?  17 Blue Rev. (06/09/16) 5.
(tolerant) I've never been.

KIDS hover in the hallway. Wren, Hallie and Katie come al Out of her gym clothes, Katie's look is edgier than the others. Buckled and worn leather boots and jeans. A scree printed heart with large black wings spread across her fa and ragged out t-shirt. They see CHLOE (17). Alert, pretty. She makes her way ove adjusting her sweater.
(sarcastic) Nice sweater...
Katie! Hallie tries to come to the rescue, but Chloe can stand u for herself.
I got it at Tilly's. It’s in all the magazines... The girls keep walking. Chloe falls in with them.
It's YOUR life. We can only offer guidance.
Eat me, bitch. The girls laugh as they near a group of BOYS. Wren lowers her voice, in a mock-British accent-

Just ahead, the Dude-Bro in his natural habitat. Let's observe, shall we? Hallie laughs at Wren's little remark as they skirt the e of the boys. But when her chuckle's over, Hallie looks ba and sees TOM (17).  Blue Rev. (06/09/16) 6. He’s tall, clean cut, and flanked by “bro”-type buddies. his broad, sleepy-eyed smile and gentle disposition sets apart from the rest. Casually, he glances in Hallie’s direction. She thinks he’s hailing her. She opens her mouth to say "Hey" back. But embarrassingly it’s a false alarm. Hallie awkwardly covers her mistake b rubbing her nose. Wren observes all and shakes her head. To add to Hallie's embarrassment, Wren calls out...
Hey Tom, what's the plan tonight? Tom smiles.
BIG plans-- But one of the boys, A BURLY KID with a Red Sox cap interrupts.
Hey! Top secret! Tom shrugs. Maybe even winks as the boys continue past. W turns laughing to Hallie.
Circle jerk? KYLE (17), slightly nerdy and definitely bookish, brings the rear. Not bad looking, but obviously the runt of the litter.
Hey, Chloe. He nods, falling just short of making effective eye conta Chloe smiles back.
So, Kyle, what's the big secret?
I could tell you but I'd have to kill you.
Yeah?  19 Blue Rev. (06/09/16) 7. Hallie rolls her eyes. The “End of the Day” bell rings.
I, for one, am intrigued but I've got to go get my sister. Hallie smiles and peels off. Chloe engages Kyle in furthe conversation. While Wren and Katie exchange amused looks.
Family dinner time. Meet Hallie’s MOTHER and FATHER, 40s. sister, LIZZIE, a sweet 14-year-old mirror image of Halli
I bumped into Coach Sanders today. He said your 1600 meter time is really improving. All that training is paying off. Good job, honey. Hallie smiles. About to say thanks, but Lizzie interrupts
Did you tell them? Dolores Constantino quit the team... Hallie shoots Lizzie a look. HALLIE’S MOTHER Why?
She's pregnant. Hallie continues to glare at Lizzie: “Why bring that up?” Their mother internally “Tsk tsks...”
What does she imagine she'll do now?
She wants to keep it. She's going to drop out and have the baby.
17-years-old? My God. It could end there but Hallie doesn’t like her mother’s t Decides to lob a grenade.  20 Blue Rev. (06/09/16) 8.
Doesn't she have the right to? Hallie’s mother jumps on it.
The question is, is it smart?

Smart isn't always what matters. Sometimes you have to do what you feel, even if it doesn't make sense. That's what it is to be a person, right? To have free will? A person has the right to say two plus two equals five. HALLIE’S MOTHER Okay, Dostoevsky. Hallie sighs in an irritated and overdramatic fashion. He mother lets it slide, but only for a moment. HALLIE’S MOTHER (CONT’D) So, I suppose WREN is going to be at Katie's tonight...

Yeah, so... HALLIE’S MOTHER So...I just noticed a change since you two started hanging out- Hallie glares at her. A stinger. Every teenager's super power. And as if on cue, the DOORBELL rings. INT. HALLIE’S HOUSE - ENTRYWAY -- MOMENTS LATER 20 Lizzie opens the door to let Wren in. She's obviously exc to see the older girl. Wren knows it and likes it.
How you doin' kid?
(making sure her parents don't hear) I wore the t-shirt you gave me to school. I got sent to the principal's office.  21 22 Blue Rev. (06/09/16) 9.
Well done. Hallie shakes her head as she grabs her coat. Playfully tweaks Lizzie's braid before she and Wren head out. Lizzi left just standing there. Wishing she could go, too.
Katie lets Hallie and Wren in.
Don't make any noise. “IT’S” dormant. Reveal KATIE’S FATHER, 40s. Ex-military but still sports crew-cut. He’s asleep on a couch in the living room. In f of an old movie. Vodka in evidence.
(resigned) Just another Friday night at the Jensen's...

A lone bare bulb hangs from the ceiling. The warm pool of light casts shadows of scattered and forgotten belongings the dark recesses under the house. Rotting wooden posts struggle to support the floor above. Somewhere in the darkness, A TINY SIX-LEGGED CREATURE skitters across a spiderweb. He watches silently from a corner where the rafters meet. four girls lounge in recycled sofas and rescued furniture the belly of the room below. It’s a dark and dank little clubhouse, hidden away from t outside world.
Seriously, I think you and Karl will make an adorable couple.
It’s Kyle. And I don't even like him...  Blue Rev. (06/09/16)
Sure, sure. Like you don't wish you were there with him at their secret sausage fest right now.
No, but... (beat) I do know what their big secret is.
Do tell.
They're all getting together at Tom's house. In his garage to try to summon Slender Man. A heavy silence fills the room.
(mockingly) Creepy. Hallie studies the others, not quite grasping the
What’s Slender Man?
(to Hallie) The guy who makes kids disappear? Hallie doesn’t have a clue.
Wait. Why have I not heard of this?

That’s a longer conversation... 10. situation. Hallie gives Wren the finger. Scopes her phone. Enters "Slender Man" in her search browser. FOOTSTEPS POUND THE FLOOR ABOVE THEM. It’s so loud they all flinch!! The girls sit frozen in place. Listening. Eyes following movement above. The light hanging over their heads sends dark shadows ove their eyes. Like they’re telling ghost stories by campfire.  Blue Rev. (06/09/16) ll.
(whispers) What the hell is he doing?

Probably looking for another bottle. (child-like) "Daddy needs his medicine..." Hallie smiles at the joke and pops in her ear buds. We watch her click on a video link. - IN THE VIDEO: A long, slow PUSH-IN on a black and white image of a burned down library. Text scrolls up from belo - “IN THE SUMMER OF 2001, SEVEN GIRLS FROM THE TOWN OF CUMBERLAND, RHODE ISLAND WENT MISSING WITHOUT A TRACE.” Hallie can still hear the girls talking back and forth.

I hate living here. All he does is drink, sleep, and shit. The girls laugh. Everyone but Hallie, focused on her phone. - The video continues to zoom in on the smoldering librar the text clears. Closer and closer.

It’s just so much worse since my mom left-- THE FLOOR CREAKS ABOVE. Katie, Chloe, and Wren look up. Following with their eyes Hallie listens with them, still watching the image on her phone as it evolves into a dark indistinguishable shape. - Then four words surface in the center of the frame. -— “ONLY ONE CAME BACK...” Katie’s eyes drop to the floor as her father’s footsteps away and disappear.
Sometimes I just wanna leave. You know?  Blue Rev. (06/09/16) 12. She glances up, looking for comfort in her friends’ eyes.
I have friends in Paris. We could stay with them.
(not looking up from her phone) What friends? You’ve never even been to Paris...
My mom has friends there, idiot. WE HEAR MORE FOOTSTEPS CARRY THROUGH THE HOUSE. Katie looks to the ceiling.

Don’t I wish. I’m totally stuck in this shithole... Then something draws Hallie’s attention back to her phone - Out of nowhere, a LOW EERIE DRONE. It grows in Hallie’s ears until it drowns out the chatter in the room. Hallie looks over as the girls continue to discuss someth she can no longer hear. - ON THE SCREEN: Something seems to be taking form in the indistinct, shadowy regions of the grainy image. Hallie struggles to focus, pulling the screen closer. In this moment, it’s like the real world around her has decelerated. Almost paused, as the INTENSE LOW TONE HEIGH in Hallie’s ears. She stares at the mysterious, silent shape on screen. Unblinking. Straining to make sense of it. Until...
Wren, Katie, and Chloe jump.
What the hell?!  Blue Rev. (06/09/16) 13.
(laughing now) Oh my God. Look!
What? The girls gather around now. Watching the same video of t burned library. Chloe reads from the screen, a haunting tone to her voice Getting into the moment.
"In the summer of 2001, seven girls from the town of Cumberland, Rhode Island went missing without a trace..."
We can read.
Good for you. We watch in silence as the girls stare at the screen. The low drone intensifies. Warbling and over-modulating.
This made you scream?
Wait. It’s coming up. The sound slowly dies out. Silence sets in around them as they huddle together in the center of the room. The tiny above keeps the darkness at bay as they focus on the phon
(whispers) It was right after-

They all jump as it leaps out at them. Then start laughin Katie snatches the phone. She backs up the video and free the frame. With the shrieking face frozen on screen, it becomes clea that it has been crudely digitally added to the still ima It's a girl. Eyes wide. Hair and face drenched in blood.  Tan Rev. (mm/dd/yy) 14.
That's- you know who that is? From "Carrie"...
That is the girl from "Carrie."

That is patently the girl from "Carrie." Hallie averts her eyes, embarrassed. Wren’s judgmental comment clearly directed at her. Katie scrolls through more links. Clicks on another... ON THE SCREEN: Disturbing images of a tall, shadowed figu Slide through frame. Always alone. Watching. Waiting. Sta without eyes. Just a pale white, blank face... ...Like it’s been erased. - A human-like depiction of a figure wearing a black suit blood red tie. Sickly pale skin covers a featureless face - The hideously thin form lurks in a dark forest, its impossibly long arms reaching towards us. - Black tentacles spread from the back of another tall figure. They twist around his body on all sides. Face bla like the others. Its elongated arms hanging at its sides. Katie grabs her laptop now. Chloe continues reading from phone. Wren looks at her cell, too.
"He preys upon innocent youth..."
Sounds like my Uncle Herbert. The girls snicker as Chloe continues.
“Slender Man is said to live ina hidden mansion, but the location is unknown...”
Really? Is he single? Chloe cracks this time. She can’t help but laugh. +e HF
23 Tan Rev. (mm/dd/yy) 15.
Here it is! (looks up) “How To Summon Slender Man." A devious smile creeps across Wren’s face.
We have to do this.
We actually don’t. Actually...

A video is cued up on Katie’s laptop. A sparse web page w a generic black background. A foreboding play symbol wait patiently. One line of basic text reads... “How To Summon Slender Man” The girls gather around as if prepping the stage for some bizarre, ancient ritual. Hallie hits the lights.
Seriously, this feels like clicking on something really Russian and malware-y.
Don’t be such a pussy. Katie shoots her a look. Wren reaches in and clicks play on the laptop.

head_text.subj: THE VIDEO EXPANDS AUTOMATICALLY, FILLING THE ENTIRE SCREE

text: - IT STARTS TO PLAY: Footage of A FOREST over a dead sile Almost a still image, but the mist slowly drifting betwee gives it away. A sinister glow from the screen up-lights the girls’ face they gaze into the display. Hypnotized. - Shots of ISOLATED LONELY TREES. Towering pillars that r into a darkened canopy. Twisted branches cutting through night sky.  Blue Rev. (06/09/16) 16.

Listen to this shit... (reading from her phone) “Those who hear the three bells toll, accept HIS invitation...When you hear the first you must close your eyes, keeping words unspoken... - On screen, eerie image after image repeat over and over Crooked trees separated by a dark void inside the forest.

If one wants to hear they must listen closely, for they are faint and distant. With eyes still closed and the mind wide open...clear your thoughts as you await the second... - An ever present fog, hides something from view. Somethi we can almost see. But the image keeps changing. Switchin another.

+.-Only opening your eyes once you hear the third...” Chloe shakes her head, trying to make sense of it. The girls are spellbound, soaking in the pale glow from t screen. Except for Chloe who nervously laughs and backs a
Whatever...this is dumb- Wren pulls Chloe reluctantly back into the mix.
Chloe! Shut up... The girls return to the image on the screen, silence ring in their ears. An anxious tension as they hold their collective breath. Listening... Waiting...

Very funny bitch. Knock it off.  Blue Rev. (06/09/16) 17. Now nervous laughter. Wren quickly shushes them. ON THE LAPTOP: We begin to hear the sound of trees creaki in the breeze. Wind rustling through branches. A moment later, very faintly...soft and far way... A BELL ECHOES IN THE FOREST. The girls look at each other.

(devious) Let’s do it. They all close their eyes, giggling. But Chloe pauses, gu shy. Wren nudges her and she follows along. Then a silent moment. We hear the girls breathe, waiting in the electric glow f the screen. ON THE LAPTOP: A SECOND FAINT BELL RESONATES, carrying ou from somewhere deep in the darkened woods on screen. With her eyes still closed, Chloe lets out an awkward lau
Are you serious? This is so--
(eyes closed)

Chloe sighs in resignation and keeps her eyes shut. ON THE LAPTOP: The sound of the forest settles. A hushed stillness. We can hear the sounds of leaves landing softl the ground. LIKE TINY FOOTSTEPS IN THE DARKNESS... Then, barely audible, a low faraway tone. An unsettling hollow ring... - THE FINAL BELL TOLLS.
Do you guys hear that?
Yes.
I think so.  24 Blue Rev. (06/09/16) 18.

Maybe. I don’t know... They open their eyes as the sound slowly dies and fades a - ON THE SCREEN NOW: A static silhouette of a large, gnar and twisted oak tree. Branches reach out into the frame l tentacles winding their way out of its thick black trunk. The girls sit, eyes fixed, waiting for something to happe But nothing comes. - Just that ominous image of the towering oak tree starin back at them. Relentless...Unwavering... - Or is it? Is the tree moving? THE SCREEN SUDDENLY STROBES WITH IMAGES WE CAN’T MAKE OUT The girls shudder, shielding themselves. - Then the image cuts out. Just disappears. THE SCREEN GOES TOTALLY BLACK. A deafening silence as the girls sit frozen in the dark r Nobody speaks. Temporarily blind. The screen now blank. Chloe and Hallie look at each other, completely unnerved. Trying to shake off the mutually disturbing feeling.

What a stupid video... But Wren’s eyes give it away. She’s just as rattled and quickly clicks the lights on. The lone bulb above them wa away the darkness. The girls breathe easier now as they recover from the intense on-screen assault. Except for Katie. Who just sits there. Staring at the bla screen...

Moonlight from a small basement window sketches outlines random junk in the room. We see the same tiny spider, spinning his web. Pausing occasionally to watch the girls who lay blanketed on couc cushions and cots in the darkness below.  Blue Rev. (06/09/16) 19. Hallie struggles to fall asleep. Wrestles with her makesh bed. Looks over at Wren and sees her eyes are open, too. unsettled look on her face. Across the room, Katie looks at her phone. And Chloe just lies there on her cot. Both also far from sleep. Hallie says nothing. Just lies back down and closes her e But we see... POV - The laptop rests on the coffee table. The tiny gree light blinking. Endlessly. Draining the power.

head_text.subj: SUDDENLY, A FLURRY OF IMAGES ON THE SCREEN

text: We can see now they are split second flashes of Slender M that quickly vanish into nothing. Back to an ordinary laptop. No blinking green light. No m power to be drained. Just a dead black screen...

Katie looks slightly distracted as she sits with Hallie, Wren, and Chloe. But the girls don’t really see it. Hallie finds her gaze continually drawn a few rows over. where Tom sits. She quickly averts her eyes when he looks her direction.
Don't make any pregnancy jokes but I felt so nauseous this morning. I threw up twice. Hallie turns at this, faintly troubled.
Have you been having nightmares? Chloe thinks about it. Shakes her head. But Hallie notice Wren react to the question.
Have you? Wren looks like she's been caught at something.
What was it?  Blue Rev. (06/09/16) 20.
Nothing really, just that video...
From the sleep over? Wren nods.
But that was like a week ago.
Not really surprising. Hallie contemplates. Meanwhile, Katie continues to stare blankly out her window. Into the treeline.

Why a cemetery? It’s hardly worth a field trip. I mean, it’s a goddamn cemetery? Large granite monuments, crumbling headstones form a crud skyline behind the gates of an old cemetery. Inside, a GROUP OF STUDENTS follow a TOUR GUIDE. Wren and girls amongst them.

This burial ground dates back to the Revolutionary War... Katie and Hallie follow, lagging behind. Katie ignores th tour and stares off into the distance. POV - A TREELINE skirts the edge of the old cemetery. The trees tower above it. A dense, untamed forest. No way to where one tree begins and another ends. TOUR GUIDE (CONT’D) Generations of soldiers have been laid to rest here since... Now the tour passes A LARGE MAUSOLEUM. Elaborate carvings etched in the cracked and deteriorating stone walls. As the guide continues on, Katie steps away from the grou She drifts across, studying the massive grave.  Blue Rev. (06/09/16) 21. A LIFE-SIZED BRONZE STATUE OF AN ANGEL guards the entranc the mausoleum. Decades of corrosion have turned the angel skin a ghastly shade of green. Katie steps over and faces the lifeless statue. Years of weathering and erosion give the horrific appeara of BLACK TEARS FLOWING FROM THE ANGEL’S EYES. Mold grows the dark stains that stream down her face. The tour guide’s voice fades into the background as Katie absorbs the angel’s empty gaze. We see a deep sadness in Katie’s eyes. Emotion hiding jus under the surface. It overwhelms her. Tears begin to form And just as her first tear is about to fall... IT TURNS BLACK AND RUNS DOWN HER CHEEK. Then another one... Two dark tears drip from her eyes. Katie wipes them away. BUT THE TEARS KEEP FLOWING. STREAMING DOWN HER FACE. Katie panics when she looks at her hands. Inky black liqu drips off her face and pools in the palms of her hands. Her panic turns to pain and she starts to choke. The blac tears streak down her face, draining the color from her s She looks back up, fighting for air...
KATIE GASPS FOR AIR. SHE CAN’T LOOK AWAY! WE SEE THE TERROR IN KATIE’S EYES AS THE STATUE RISES UP
KATIE STANDS PARALYZED. SHE CAN’T MOVE. IT HAS CONTROL OV
SHE CAN’T BREATHE!! SHE CAN’T SCREAM!!!
Katie! KATIE’S BODY JOLTS AS SHE SNAPS OUT OF THE VISION.
We see Hallie’s face. She stands right in front of Katie.  Blue Rev. (06/09/16) 22. Everything is back to normal. The angel stands silently outside the mausoleum.
Katie... Katie looks around, confusion all over her face.

(to Katie) You okay, young lady? Looks like you've seen a ghost... Katie shakes her head. TOUR GUIDE (CONT’D) Well, you wouldn’t be the first... As the group continues on, Katie’s eyes are drawn again t the distant treeline.

A bus-load of kids sit waiting. Everyone there, except Ka Hallie looks out, scanning the perimeter for her friend. At the gates of the cemetery. A TEACHER talks to the BUS DRIVER. Just out of earshot. We see the urgency in the teacher’s words. The anxiety in her eyes. The bus driver looks past her, searching...
It’s Katie we're waiting for?
Yeah. I think.
Did she seem weird to you today?
Weird? Wren looks at Hallie.
Weird how? Hallie shrugs, shaking her head.
I don’t know. Distant. She hardly said anything all day.  Blue Rev. (06/09/16) 23.
Where is she?
Well, her bag’s here. She wouldn’t just leave without it. She motions to the backpack slung on the seat next to her

The students, now pulled off the bus, stand by as MORE TEACHERS and SCHOOL OFFICIALS confer with CEMETERY OFFICI The girls watch as the commotion swirls around them. Hall finds that, by chance, Tom is standing right next to her. He looks in her direction. They catch eyes. Hallie takes it as an invitation.
If we have to stand around here any longer, I think I’m gonna die. Tom gives a slight chuckle.
No pun intended...
(amused) None taken. Tom’s smile slowly fades as they share an awkward pause. Nearby, Wren's on her phone, as Chloe anxiously looks on.
Katie, cut this shit out. We're all prisoners ‘cause of you....
(to Hallie) None of you saw where she went? Hallie just shakes her head. Wren hangs up and steps over
It cut me off! Her mailbox is full.

She hasn't answered any of my texts, either.  31 Blue Rev. (06/09/16) 24. Hallie, Wren, and Tom look up to see Chloe’s eyes widenin They spin around, and as if to confirm their darkest fear A TRIO OF POLICE CARS SWOOP INTO THE PARKING LOT.
Oh, shit!!
This is getting serious, people...

The tired sun dips behind the treeline. Slender shadows r across the graveyard, welcoming nightfall. POLICE talk to school officials, finally releasing kids t their waiting PARENTS. There are FLASHLIGHTS in the woods. A SEARCH PARTY. Chloe watches them moving behind the trees. The lights vanish and reappear as they hunt for any sign her missing friend. Under everything, like a whisper in t wind, we can hear the sound of the workers calling her na “Kaaaaatieee...” Wren judges the look on Chloe’s face.

She just ditched. Trust me. She’1l still be there annoying us tomorrow. Chloe nods. The sentiment helps, but she’s not convinced. Hallie rummages through Katie's bag nearby. She stops and peeks inside. Reaches in and pulls out... AN OLD LIBRARY BOOK. The cover partially torn. Pages comi unbound. The title instantly strikes her: BARDO THODOL. The worn pages almost break and split, crackling as Halli flips through. Wren leans in to get a better look. A SERIES OF HAUNTING ILLUSTRATIONS FLASH BY... - Dark spirits and tortured souls. - Winged demons with razor sharp teeth.  32 Blue Rev. (06/09/16) 25. - Phantoms amid a desolate landscape burning in the sun. - A man screams, flesh being ripped from his body.
What class was this for? Wren and Chloe have no response. In the shadow of the graveyard behind them, the question takes on more weight. Wren just gestures towards the parking lot.
Hallie... Hallie's parents pull up, her mother waving from the wind
I'll keep this shit for her.
(to Chloe and Wren) Do you need a ride?
My mom’s on her way.
Okay. Call you later... Hallie hands over the book and heads to the car. As she leaves, she glances back over her shoulder. Still no sign of Katie...

News about Katie's disappearance plays on the TV. Hallie watching with her family in the living room. As she live- texts with Wren and Chloe- Wren: This is unreal. Hallie: I know. Chloe: My mom asked if she was doing porn. Hallie: And I thought my parents were dumb. Hallie’s father turns up the TV volume now. She looks up.  Blue Rev. (06/09/16) 26.

Despite new footage, we're still left with more questions than answers. ON TV: Shaky phone footage of the students at the cemeter Kids have their lunch on the grass. Katie is visible in t background of the shot, unnoticed by the foreground kids. stands very still, frozen, staring off into the woods.
No word at this time about any possible mental health issues she might have had or...
(interrupting) Was she on drugs? Hallie shoots her sister a look.
(quietly) You're not helping.
Was she?
No. Don’t be ridiculous. Hallie’s family thinks she has answers to the mystery. Bu she doesn’t...
OMINOUS POV - As if something is watching the school from woods.

STUDENTS listen as a TEACHER drones on in the background. Hallie stares out the window. Searching. Trying to compre the grim fact that Katie is still missing. Then Hallie’s expression darkens. Something unsettling... HALLIE’S POV - Two police cars pull up in front of the school. THE OFFICERS hop out. There’s a short exchange an they head into the building.  Blue Rev. (06/09/16) 27. A murmur rolls through the classroom as other students ta notice.
Hallie. Hallie snaps out of it and looks up.
They need you in the principal’s office... As Hallie gathers her things, the whispers evolve into a of conversation. Theories about Katie’s disappearance fil the air and follow her out of the room.
When did you last see her?
The blank, white walls give it the feel of an interrogati room. Hallie sits opposite a stern-faced PRINCIPAL and TW POLICE OFFICERS. Confused and nervous, she chooses her wo carefully.
At the cemetery...
And before that?
It was Saturday. We spent the night at Katie’s house...
We?
Me, Chloe and Hallie...
We slept in the basement.
Mr. Jensen was upstairs. Passed out on the couch. Again...

head_text.subj: THE LIGHTS SHORT OUT IN SEQUENCE, THE DARKNESS WORKING IT
WAY ACROSS THE ROOM... TOWARDS WREN

text: Wren starts to back away, the book falling from her hands
WREN’S HEAD... Wren slowly looks up.

An involuntary scream escapes Wren’s throat. It carries o into the empty void surrounding her. And then nothing. On silence. In a panic, she uses her phone as a flashlight a scans the aisle behind her. WREN’S POV - It’s too dark to make it out, but there is t faint outline of a tall static figure at the other end.
Wren backs away. WREN’S POV - THE TALL STATIC FIGURE JUST STANDS THERE... STARING AT HER... Wren strains to make it out. And then... IT MOVES!! The figure slides towards us.

Wren screams and bolts out of the aisle. WREN’S POV - The light from the phone reaches into blackn Spotlighting an endless row of books that leads into noth Wren races through the darkness, the phone spotting the w ahead. Books fly past, the light flashing across them.  Cherry Rev. (mm/dd/yy) 82.
She ducks into another aisle.
Help!! No answer. Her voice just carries out into darkness as sh races past the books.
She turns another corner. Rows of books endlessly streaki past. We hear Wren’s rapid breaths. Her footsteps poundin

head_text.subj: SHE REACHES THE END OF THE AISLE AGAIN

text: IT’S LIKE A MAZE IN THE DARK!! WHICH WAY!? Wren flashes the light around her. Nothing but stacks of books everywhere.

head_text.subj: JUST LINES OF SHELVES LEADING INTO DARKNESS

text: Desperate, she just picks a direction. The light shakes a she runs, only carrying a few strides ahead. SUDDENLY, THE BEAM OF LIGHT FLASHES ACROSS SOMETHING...

head_text.subj: AND TIE, STARING FROM A HORRIBLY BLANK, FEATURELESS FACE

text: Wren tries to stop and slides to the floor. WE HEAR WREN’S BLOOD CURDLING SCREAM AS THE FIGURE MOVES

A chaotic sweep of light splashes across the figure as Wr scrambles to her feet. She reverses direction, in a full sprint. Only the phone spotting the way ahead. Aisle after aisle fly past as she races aimlessly. Turnin right, turning left. LOST IN THE MAZE, UNTIL...

head_text.subj: SOMETHING SLIDES OUT IN FRONT OF HER
EVERY FLUORESCENT FIXTURE ABOVE INSTANTLY BLAZES WITH LIG

text: Books fly in all directions as the darkness is washed awa  65 Cherry Rev. (mm/dd/yy) 83.

head_text.subj: THE LIBRARIAN'S CART TUMBLES TO THE FLOOR IN FRONT OF HER

text: The librarian stands frozen, book in hand. Eyes wide. Sta at a raving lunatic.

Young lady, are you okay? Panting and out of breath, Wren quickly looks around. EVERYTHING IS BACK TO NORMAL. Just a quiet library. Nothi behind her. Nothing chasing her. Wren sits there, head spinning. Catching her breath. And then something catches her eye... WREN’S POV: A book scattered on the floor. “BIOELECTRIC SYSTEMS AND THE PARANORMAL” Wren grabs it and scrambles to her feet. The librarian stands in shock, just staring as Wren runs and disappears around the corner.
Hallie is on her way to track practice. Wren marches up. Obviously distraught.
You didn't get my messages?
My phone’s in my locker.
Okay... Please, just listen to me. I ran all the way here. Wren hands are TREMBLING. Hallie's never seen her like th
I understand now. Hallie looks around. Not wanting to draw attention.
What AlleyKat was trying to tell me...it’s proof! Wren shows Hallie the book from the library. She opens it a marked page.  Blue Rev. (06/09/16) 84.

Paranormal contact with bioelectric systems often result in a SYMBIOTIC RELATIONSHIP. The effects on host organisms have been well documented and manifest in various forms... personality change, bizarre behavior, mental illness, psychosis, loss of contact with reality, hallucination, self mutilation, suicide, and NONSPECIFIC DISSOLUTION. (looks at Hallie) They just disappear. People start to look their way.
Wren. Chill...
It’s exactly like AlleyKat said. When you contact him, it becomes part of you. Like a virus. But one you can’t get rid of! Wren tries to catch her breath.
Has anything weird happened to you? Anything strange? Hallie hesitates. Wren sees it.
Do not hold out on me bitch...
(whispers) Okay. I was talking to Tom between classes--
(negative) Tom?
What’s wrong with Tom?

head_text.subj: WHO GIVES A SHIT ABOUT TOM

text: I thought I saw something in the trees.
It was him. Hallie protests.
I didn’t say that. It could have been anything...
(please...) It was him! (beat) What about Chloe? Have you talked to her?
Her mom keeps saying she’s sick. Last time I called, she pretty much flat-out told me to stay away.
We need to go see her right now... Hallie looks around.
I have practice. I can’t just leave-
(quote fingers) I thought you didn’t care about track? With that Wren walks off. But tosses back for good measur

Call me when you grow a conscience. Gauntlet thrown. Hallie thinks for a beat. Makes a decision... 66 EXT. CHLOE’S HOUSE -- DAY 66 Near dusk. Hallie and Wren stand across from Chloe’s hous Hallie pulls out her cell. Calls Chloe again. No answer. texts her. No response.  Blue Rev. (06/09/16) 86.
Chloe hasn’t answered a single text or call. You know that’s not like her. Something’s definitely up. We gotta talk to her...
Her mom’s gonna run interference.

Duh! That’s why we gotta go around the side. Knock on her window, moron... Hallie nods “Okay”. And the two move toward the house. As quietly as possible, they duck down beneath the living room window. Peek in to see: Chloe's Mother sitting on a in a dim den. Her shoulders slumped in a wreath of cigare smoke. They move on to Chloe’s room now. Wren cups her hands ove her eyes to see better. But no luck. She shakes her head. Can’t see anything. Until...

head_text.subj: CHLOE POPS UP IN THE WINDOW RIGHT ABOVE THEM

text: AND DOESN’T SEEM TO NOTICE HER FRIENDS! IN FACT, LOOKS RI THROUGH THEM...
The sun is nearly down. A shaken Wren and Hallie regroup the block.
Did you see that? She looked right through us! Like we weren’t there... Hallie did see. Tries to make sense of it all...
She saw him! In the woods. I knew it... SUDDENLY, HALLIE'S PHONE RINGS. They both stop in their tracks.  Blue Rev. (06/09/16) 87.

It's Chloe. Hallie shows Wren the phone. We see the name. The accompanying photo. A tiny selfie of Chloe. The way they remember her, smiling up at them from screen. Hallie answers. Puts it on speaker.
Hello. But there’s only silence.
(into phone) Hello? Chloe? We hear shuffling on the other end of the line. Then a fa murmur. Something that sounds like crying. A soft whimper
Now I know...
Chloe? What is it?
It’s happening all the time...He won’t go away... The words come fast. Wren interrupts.
Chloe? Who? No response.
Chloe, are you there? Chloe mumbles again. As the girls strain to hear..
He won’t stop...
What does he want? (beat) Chloe...Chloe are you there? Silence. Then we hear Chloe crying.  Blue Rev. (06/09/16)
Don't ever call me again. CALL ENDED. She hangs up. Wren and Hallie look at each other.

What the hell was that? They look in the direction of Chloe's house. 88. The sky burns orange above the dark suburban street. A st light flicks on. Darkness will be here soon. Hallie makes a decision. Walks away.
I don't want to do this anymore.
I don't either! But I'm stuck in it. You're stuck in it, too. You just don't know it yet.
What am I stuck in?
What we started. Hello? Hallie crosses her arms.
Don't look at me like that. I'm not doing a "thing."
All right...
And don't say "All right” like that to me. This is real Goddamnit!
Nope. I’m done. No more games.
It’s not a game. Don’t you get it? (beat) We only saw the website video. But Chloe... She saw HIM in the woods!  Blue Rev. (06/09/16) 89.
(uncertain) She said...
She said what exactly? Hallie’s truly reached her limit.
I'm not going to let you keep dragging me into this craziness.
You think I created this situation?
I think you love the drama...

Read the book I showed you. You’1ll see the body count. Thousands of disappearances. Search parties... Faces on milk cartons... I’m not making this shit up. It all happened EXACTLY like AlleyKat said...
AlleyKat93, of course. The expert who knows everything. Funny you didn't talk about this body count stuff before. Wren stammers a bit, thrown off balance by that...
It was all hearsay then. Just talk. But now it’s not just her saying it. It’s right there in black and white. And Alleykat knows first hand...

Yeah. And she’s probably some 50- year-old horny dude living in someone's basement, getting off on emailing back and forth with teenage girls...Ya ever think of that? Did you? And with that, Hallie turns her back to leave. Wren gets really angry now.  68 69 Blue Rev. (06/09/16) 90.
You think you can just go back to real life?!

(tosses back) Yeah. I do. In fact, I have a “real life” date with “real life” Tom tonight. In real life... Wren takes this like a gunshot. And Hallie escalates the insult by continuing to walk away... Wren shouts after her-
You heard what Chloe said! He’s not going to stop! And going on a date with Abercrombie Tom can’t change that! Hallie almost turns around. But instead throws her arm up the air. Flips Wren off.
You know I’m right!! But Hallie just walks away...

Hallie makes final adjustments in the mirror. Tries to fo about her tiff with Wren. Determined that all is, and wil be, normal. INT. HALLIE’S HOUSE - DINING ROOM -- NIGHT 69 Hallie heads out. Past the dining room where her parents Lizzie eat. HALLIE’S MOTHER Not joining us for dinner?

Can’t. Got plans. Hallie resumes her exit. But- HALLIE’S FATHER Hold on a second...  70 71 Blue Rev. (06/09/16) 91. Hallie can hear it in her father’s tone. He’s not happy. turns back. HALLIE’S FATHER (CONT’D) Coach Sanders called. Said you walked out on practice today. And missed one last week. What’s going on? Busted. But Hallie’s emotional right now and going on thi date if it kills her.
I gotta go. HALLIE’S MOTHER Honey... We’re just asking-- But Hallie’s out the door. So confused and agitated by al that’s happening.
Checking her makeup, Hallie knocks on the front door. Tom opens it moments later. Happy to see her.
Hey.
Sorry I’m late...
No. Come in.
Hallie flashes an anxious smile and follows Tom in. She avoids eye contact trying to keep the excitement at bay.
I thought I had the wrong house. There aren't any cars in the driveway.
Yeah, my dad's on a business thing. And my mom went someplace with some friends of hers.
Nobody's home?  72 Blue Rev. (06/09/16) 92. She hesitates just long enough to show it makes her nervo
Just us. That okay?
Sure.
Hallie checks out Tom’s collection of comic books, Fan Bo figurines, and Sci Fi movie paraphernalia.
(smiling) I didn’t know you were a nerd...

Yeah... I wasn’t always this handsome. Hallie laughs. They sit on a comfy couch. An old turntabl spins a vinyl record around and around. A simple vocal ov soulful rhythm fills the air. Hallie casts sidelong glances at Tom, who seems to really into the song.
Listen to that sound... Hallie nods, pretending she gets it. Her eyes wander arou the room. She focuses on the impressive collection of vin records stacked on shelves.
That’s a lot of records.
Yeah, most of them are my dad's, but the newer stuff is mine... He gestures to the current song.
Cool.
You want me to put something else on?

No, this is great.  Blue Rev. (06/09/16) 93. Then a pause in the conversation. An opportunity... Tom finally makes his move and kisses her. Hallie falls b into the couch, running her fingers through his hair. Tom starts to round the bases, hands exploring. And for a moment, Hallie doesn’t resist. But then pushes back, slowing it down. Taking control.
You okay? She nods and a big smile appears on her face. They slowly ease back on the sofa as the music continues in the background. Then just as Hallie closes her eyes and lets herself go...
Hallie turns to look at the speakers.
Do you hear that?
Good. Right? Tom doesn’t seem to notice. Hallie scans the room, ears w open. Listening. But the music returns to normal.
Come here... He pulls Hallie closer. But just as she turns back... TOM'S FACE HAS CHANGED!! IT’S NOW JUST A VAGUE SUGGESTION SOMETHING HUMAN, DISAPPEARING INTO A BLANK VISAGE.

Tom disappears as the room seems to warp and expand impossibly around her. The music devolves into the same h pitched noise we’ve heard before. Screaming from the speakers. Louder and louder as the room transforms. And i the chaos...
Then instantly...WE GO BACK TO REALITY. Tom jumps off Hallie like he's been electrocuted. Hallie bolts upright.  73 Blue Rev. (06/09/16) 94.
What the hell? Hallie’s eyes dart around the room. Checking all four corners. But everything has returned to normal. Except Tom is now looking at her like she’s a complete lunatic.
I didn't do anything.
(still confused) What?
I didn't do anything!
(mortified) I know. Tom relaxes. She catches her breath.
Are you okay? Hallie looks at him. Long story...
Tom comes back in the room with a glass of water. Hands i Hallie. Takes a look at her phone.
Have you told anybody about this? She shakes her head.
If Katie was on a weird Slender Man site, who knows who she met there? Probably some guy with a van. I hate to say it... He starts tapping on her phone, searching for something.
(beat) Is this it? Hallie looks up and sees what he's doing.  Blue Rev. (06/09/16) 95.
Don't! That “How to Summon Slender Man” video starts to play.
I've never seen this one...
Tom, don't! He looks at her, startled. She jumps up, grabs for her ph He reflexively holds it out at arm's length.
You can't watch it. Promise me you won't watch it. Ever.
It’s just a video--
(interrupting) No. Really. YOU HAVE TO PROMISE ME!
(starts to laugh) Okay, I won't...
I’m not kidding. Promise me. Tom is dubious but can see she’s serious. He gives Hallie back her phone.
Okay. I promise... Hallie looks at him, anxiety dancing in her eyes. He pull her close. Tries to give comfort.
Really. Finally, she nods thinking he just might mean it.

Okay, well... I should probably go. One last kiss and Tom walks her to the front door.  76 77 Blue Rev. (06/09/16) 96. INT. HALLIE’S BEDROOM - NIGHT 76 Hallie bursts in and drops her things on the bed. Half of scatters onto the floor. She takes a deep breath trying to calm. In the bedroom mi Hallie sees the desperation in her eyes. The fear on her face. She’s almost unrecognizable to herself. Finally she breaks. Sobbing. She turns away so she can’t the tears and lets it all go.
Hallie drifts unnoticed through a seemingly endless crowd students. Emotionless. Completely torn down. Until she tu the corner and sees...
Chloe carries books like any other student, but something different. Her skin so pale. Except for the make-up caked her face. Like a corpse prepared for an open casket funer
Chloe... She passes, without acknowledging Hallie's presence. Hall turns to go after her.
Chloe! Wait! What's going on? Chloe stops. Turns to Hallie with a crazed and paranoid l on her face.
Something happened... To you. And Katie, I guess. Something's going to happen to me. And Wren, too. Isn't it? No response.

Is it already happening? I've seen things? I can’t explain it... A thin smile creeps across Chloe’s face. She breaks into strange laugh. We see the confusion on Hallie’s face as s watches Chloe drift into a crowded hallway.  78 Blue Rev. (06/09/16) 97.

An EYE stares up at us from a metal tray. A COW’S EYE. Biology class. STUDENTS are lined up at different tables cow eyes in front of them. SCALPELS AND SCISSORS in hand. Hallie sees Wren. Who looks the other way. Then sees Chlo two tables over silently staring out the window. The scal hanging from her hand.

Hey, look who decided to show up! We see Tom duck into the room. Distracted and out of brea like he was being chased. Hallie smiles as he comes closer. But he just slips past, taking the open stool at the end of her table. Wren scowls... BIOLOGY TEACHER (CONT’D) All right, first, take a moment to observe the external anatomy... Hallie leans back to draw Tom’s attention. He still seems not acknowledge she's there. She whispers-
Hey. He doesn't respond. Hallie faces forward as the teacher w by.

The cornea looks cloudy and bluish because of the preservation process... Hallie looks at the cloudy, bluish eye then back to Tom. BIOLOGY TEACHER (CONT’D) Now slice as evenly as you can through the sclera to separate the anterior features of the eye... Around Hallie, students are cutting now. Including Chloe. speaks louder this time-
Tom! He looks. Seems to notice her for the first time.  Blue Rev. (06/09/16) 98.
Are you okay? It takes him half a beat but he smiles.
Yeah, I’m fine. Hallie nods but can see Tom’s smile is short-lived. He lo harried. Hallie’s about to say something else to him but interrupted by a...

Hallie turns to see kids backing away from one of the tab Chloe’s table. We see confusion on Hallie’s face. Chloe just stands there, alone at the table. Oblivious to other kids backing away. The commotion spreads like a wav through the classroom. Then Hallie sees... Chloe cutting herself! Drawing the point of her scalpel across her palm as if testing its sharpness! Blood pours the table. And then...

head_text.subj: CHLOE HOLDS THE SCALPEL UP TO HER EYE

text: We hear chairs scooting. Kids jumping to their feet. Hall eyes widen, frozen in the moment. Chloe studies the blade for a long beat, a sinister smile her face. And then...
As we cut away there are SCREAMS!!! Hallie and Wren just stands there. Watching. Paralyzed wi terror as the Teacher grabs for Chloe. Desperately trying pry the scalpel out of her hands...
We watch as the class erupts into chaos! Students rushing of the room screaming.

PARAMEDICS wheel Chloe to an ambulance. With tears streaming down, Hallie and Wren watch Chloe disappear behind the ambulance doors. For a moment, Tom stands behind them. We see the fear on face. Then he slowly slips away behind the gathering crow Wren and Hallie lock eyes. The nightmare is only getting worse...
I told you... (crying hysterically) I told you and you wouldn’t believe me. Hallie just stands there, shaking. Tears pour from her ey as the ambulance’s lights and siren slowly fade away.
Hallie races upstairs. Her Mother in hot pursuit.
Hallie, are you all right?
Yeah, Mom.
Lizzie told us about Chloe... Hallie stops.

I can't believe it. You were there? Did you see her do it? Hallie can’t speak. She can’t find the words. HALLIE'S MOTHER (CONT’D) Oh my God. That poor girl. Hallie’s mother doesn’t know the half of it.
I need to lie down... She trails off. Her Mother nods.  81 82 Blue Rev. (06/09/16) 100.

Of course. I’m so sorry. She gives Hallie a hug. Senses something... HALLIE’S MOTHER Are you okay? Hallie nods. HALLIE’S MOTHER (CONT’D) Because your sister’s taking it very hard. I’m worried about her. She hasn’t come out of her room since she got home...

I'm just tired. HALLIE’S MOTHER Can I get you anything? Hallie shakes her head and keeps going. INT. HALLIE’S BEDROOM -- LATER 81 Hallie’s computer sits in her lap. That ominous Slender M website up on the screen. She types a message in the chat window. TO ALLEYKAT93: “You have to help us!” The cursor blinks. No response. She tries again: “How do you make him go away?” She press send. Adds: "PLEASE!!!" But gets an automatic response: “USER ACCOUNT DISCONTINUE On Hallie. We see hope fade and the fear return...

Hallie lies in bed. Eyes fixed on a framed photo that sit her bedside table: Herself, Wren, Katie and Chloe in a go selfie from happier times. She looks at the picture as if it were a distant memory. Then... SPORADIC SOBS OUT IN THE HALL. HER PARENTS WHISPERING.  83 Blue Rev. (06/09/16) 101. Hallie sits up-

Come on. Just breathe, Lizzie. INT. HALLIE’S HOUSE - HALLWAY/BATHROOM -- CONTINUOUS 83 Hallie moves through the dark hallway, towards a light in bathroom. We hear Lizzie crying. Her parents urgent voice Hallie’s almost running now. She reaches the half-open door and sees her Father tendin Lizzie. Lizzie’s struggling to breathe. Hallie's Mother stands by feeling helpless.
What's going on?
She can’t breathe. We have to get her to the emergency room. Lizzie gulps for air.

Lizzie? Oh my God... Lizzie looks up with swollen red eyes. Tears streak down pale skin on her face. Her hands tremble. HALLIE’S FATHER The ambulance is on its way... Hallie's Father starts bundling Lizzie in a towel. Hallie watches helplessly as he carries Lizzie past her. HALLIE’S MOTHER It’s okay, baby... Lizzie begins to lose consciousness, her eyes rolling bac her head! Hallie rushes over.
Lizzie! Wake up!!
We’re all here, Lizzie.

Where’s that ambulance?!  84 87 Blue Rev. (06/09/16) 102. Finally, we hear SIRENS in the distance. INT. LIZZIE’'S HOSPITAL ROOM -- NIGHT 84 Lizzie’s bed sits in a pool of harsh light. Pale skin and dark eyes. The vital signs monitor tracks her pulse. Hallie sits bedside listening to her Mother cry as the do tells them Lizzie had a MASSIVE ANXIETY ATTACK. Hallie’s father steps over shielding Hallie from the deta HALLIE’S FATHER Hallie, give us a minute. Why don’t you go get your Mother something to drink...? Hallie’s father hands her some money and motions to the d

Hallie taps away on her phone as she walks towards a vend machine at the end of the hallway. She sends a text to To ON THE PHONE: “YOU AROUND?” Hallie comes to the end of the hallway. No answer... She punches a button on the vending machine, a lost look her eyes as the soda tumbles out. She grabs it and turns walk away. But as she does... Hallie sees an ORDERLY step out of a room down the hall. Outside the room is a cluster of BALLOONS... THE NAME “CHLOE” ON ONE OF THEM. Hallie’s feet slow as she approaches the open doorway. Slowly, she peeks inside. POV - A curtain sections off the room. INT. CHLOE’S HOSPITAL ROOM -- CONTINUOUS 87 The curtain slides back. Hallie enters to see “Get well” cards and flowers.  Blue Rev. (06/09/16) 103. BUT THE BED IS EMPTY.
Hallie? Hallie startles! For a moment she can’t locate her, but f Chloe sitting by the window in a wheelchair. Her eyes are bandaged with thick pads of gauze.
Chloe. Oh my God. How’d you know it was-—-
I can smell your perfume... Hallie doesn’t see the sinister grin creeping across Chlo face as she moves closer.
Are you okay? A tiny laugh escapes Chloe’s throat. A hideous, dry rasp.
(grins morbidly) I tried to stop it. But it didn't work... Chloe reaches up and picks at one of the bandages.
No. Don't do that! Hallie tries to stop her hands, but Chloe pushes her away
I realize now. He’1ll never stop.

head_text.subj: CHLOE RIPS THE GAUZE FROM HER FACE

text: The bandages fall away and we see...

head_text.subj: HER MISSING EYES ARE NOW DEEP CRIMSON XS OF SCARRED TISSU

text: But I can still see!
88 Blue Rev. (06/09/16) 104. The horrific stare turns Hallie for the door and the scre chase her into the hallway.

Hallie rushes away. Past the nurse’s station. Back to Lizzie's room... Her parents are gone. No doctors and nurses. We see distr on Hallie's face and then... SHE GASPS. LIZZIE’S BODY IS COVERED IN A WHITE SHEET! The hum from the lights fill our ears as Hallie slowly pa over to the bed. Hallie reaches towards the rigid body. Hands trembling. Slowly, she pulls back the white sheet and reveals a face
No... Hallie gently touches her hand to Lizzie’s face.
Lizzie...come on...wake up... Her voice falters. She shakes her sister.
Lizzie... But it does nothing. Hallie starts to cry. Tears flowing. Dripping from her eyes.

No... Then we see a single tear come from Lizzie’s eye. Hallie wipes the tear. Then Lizzie’s face twitches! A microscopic movement. A tiny muscle contraction under o of Lizzie’s eyes. Hallie see it and a burst of hope appears on her face.  92 Blue Rev. (06/09/16) 105.
Lizzie! LIZZIE’S FACE TWITCHES AGAIN.

Wake up! Lizzie’s eyes still don’t open, but the muscles begin to twitch all over now. Contorting Lizzie’s face. Strange expressions of unknown emotions. Hallie shakes her again. AND LIZZIE’S HEAD FALLS TO THE SIDE. HER MOUTH HANGING OP Like she’s going to say something! Hallie stares at her, waiting for the words. Lizzie’s lip begin to move and we see... A GIANT BUG CRAWL OUT OF HER MOUTH. Hallie jumps back and screams! THEN ANOTHER BUG EMERGES... AND ANOTHER...Lizzie’s face bubbles under the skin. Rippling like water. Expanding an contracting until...

head_text.subj: HER EYELIDS OPEN. BUT THERE ARE NO EYES. ONLY BUGS

text: They burrow out from under the skin on Lizzie’s face. We them scurrying and gnawing their way through. Hundreds crawling out of the flesh. HALLIE BACKS AWAY HORRIFIED! Turns to run...

head_text.subj: ONLY TO SEE HER PARENTS COME IN. AND THE ROOM AROUND HER

text: Hallie? You okay? Hallie tries to comprehend. Looks over and sees Lizzie sleeping in bed. Struggling but still with us. Emotion overwhelms Hallie. She can’t keep it in anymore. Her Mother and Father look at each other, confused. HALLIE’S FATHER Hallie, we're worried about you. You haven’t been yourself lately.  94 95 96 Blue Rev. (06/09/16) 106. She looks into her parents’ eyes. They’1l never believe h if she told them. Hallie bursts into tears.

A crowded hallway. Kids make their way to class like it w any other day. Moving on, like nothing has happened. Hallie walks with her head down. Trying not to see anythi Or anyone. Fearful of more visions.

Hallie enters, distant and distracted. Her Biology Teache welcomes everyone back. With a heavy heart. Hallie sees Wren. An emotional, loaded beat. Then notices Tom is absent. We can see the anxiety flickering inside. She grabs her p and texts him... Hallie: Where are you? She stares at the screen. No message back. Hallie is abou message him again when...

head_text.subj: A WAVE OF CONFUSION RUSHES THROUGH THE CLASSROOM

text: Hallie and Wren look up to see kids out of their seats. A the windows. Whispering. Pointing... With tentative steps, the girls cross over to the windows It’s almost like they know what they’re about to see...
TOM STANDS ON THE LEDGE OF THE BELL TOWER! High above the ground... Leaning out, eyes locked on the ground below. Like he’s g to jump!
Wren and her classmates just stand there, shocked and confused. Staring out the windows. Hallie charges past. Rushes out of the room.
A crowd of STUDENTS, TEACHERS, and SECURITY have gathered below the tower. Looking up at Tom. Calling 911. Begging to come down. Begging him not to jump... Hallie comes running.
(yells up to him)
Tom spots Hallie fighting her way through the crowd.
Tom... WHAT ARE YOU DOING?!
(yells down)
The crowd's attention quickly shifts to Hallie. Collectiv waiting for an answer. Right about what?
And that’s when Tom makes it clear...

Shit! He watched the video... We hear SIRENS. EMERGENCY RESPONDERS on the way. TOM’S POV: In the distance, at the edge of the woods stan blurred figure. Tall and slender. Arms outstretched like branches of a tree. Beckoning...
IT’S OKAY! COME DOWN! TOM, PLEASE!
BACK ON TOM: A realization appears on his face. An unnatu look of joy...  Blue Rev. (06/09/16) 108.

head_text.subj: HE STEPS OVER THE EDGE AND FREE FALLS
FRIGHTENED VOICES CRY OUT FROM THE CROWD

text: AS TOM’S BODY CRASHES TO THE GROUND!!! AND HALLIE SCREAMS!! A study in shock and terror. Tears streaming down her face. Frozen in this nightmare...

Hallie wanders aimlessly like a lost child. Walking down hallway that feels like it stretches out forever. A round of laughter draws her attention to one of the roo Inside the room, a family jokes around, cheering up a lit girl in a hospital bed. All smiles as a nurse prepares th tiny patient for release. But the smiles bring sadness to Hallie’s eyes. She starts cry, the weight of everything crumbling around her. We can see the pain in Hallie’s eyes as we follow her aro the corner. Then we hear SHRIEKS from down the hallway. Hallie sees nurses hurrying towards a hospital room. RUSHING INTO LIZZIE’S ROOM! Hallie moves quicker now. Almost running as she reaches t door. Inside the room... IT IS LIZZIE SHRIEKING. OUT OF CONTROL. Hallie’s Mother and Father look up as Hallie steps into t room. We see the panic in their eyes. The tears. INT. LIZZIE’S HOSPITAL ROOM -- CONTINUOUS A DOCTOR stands over Lizzie reading her vital signs. He b orders at the NURSES who respond immediately. Efficient l a machine. Working in unison.
Let's get her moving. The railing slides up on the sides of Lizzie’s bed. The wheels release. An IV is attached to a hanger. And suddenly, Lizzie is being wheeled towards the door.

Where are they taking her? She rushes over, grabbing Lizzie’s bed. Hallie’s Father s her, letting the nurses pass. HALLIE’S FATHER Hallie, they’ve got to get her to the ICU... MORE SCREAMS from Lizzie. Her face paler than before.

Was it hidden in darkness? Or did it appear out of thin a The towering structure blends into the forest around it. Overgrown. Abandoned. And perched on a crumbling pedestal rock in front of it... AND AT THAT EXACT SAME MOMENT, THE GIRLS’ PHONES DIE. The flashlights disappear and the room goes dark.

The girls freeze. A shiver rolls down their spines.

No response. Just that high pitched sound... Hallie falls to the ground as a TENDRIL enters frame, lik some kind of grasping vine made of translucent flesh. The “suit” is mottled, fleshy. The tie is just a smear of reddish liquid. Where “face” should be is a roiling mass of some unknown substa Finally, a look of acceptance on Hallie’s face. And then. The world brightens all around us. Shadows disappear as t skies fill with light. Is it the first ray of light as th sun peeks over the horizon? Or something else?
